snippet.title: Echo Night (PS1) Trailer Intro
snippet.description: This is the demo intro movie for Echo Night (PS1).  It was released in 1998 in the U.S.  Echo Night is a very unique kind of horror game.  You must help ghosts find peace.  The music is good.
